system.description: Pugilists are masters of unarmed combat who turn their bodies into deadly weapons. Their devastating punches and grappling techniques make them formidable frontline bruisers.

features.name: Fisticuffs
features.description: Your Unarmed attacks deal 1d6 damage (increasing to 1d8 at 5th level and 1d10 at 9th level), and you can make an Unarmed attack as a Move.

features.name: Haymaker
features.description: You gain the Wrestler Perk. When you hit with an Unarmed attack, you can push the target 5 feet.

features.name: Deflect Missiles
features.description: When hit by a Ranged attack, you can use your Reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Dexterity + your Pugilist Level.

features.name: Stunning Blow
features.description: When you hit with an Unarmed attack, you can force the target to make a Fortitude Save or be Dazed until the end of your next Turn.

features.name: Iron Body
features.description: While you are not wearing Armor, you have +1 Armor. You also have resistance to Bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Flurry of Blows
features.description: When you take the Attack Action with an Unarmed attack, you can make two additional Unarmed attacks.

features.name: Perfect Form
features.description: Your Unarmed attacks count as (+2) Relics, and you have Favor on all Saves while you are not wearing Armor.
